Uses of Class
it.apice.sapere.api.SAPEREException

Packages that use SAPEREException
it.apice.sapere.api This package is the root of all SAPERE system interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.scheduling This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw ratings, involved in ecolaw scheduling logic. 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.terms This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw terms. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space This package contains LSA-space interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core This package contains LSA-space internals interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core.strategy This package contains LSA-space strategy customization pipeline definition. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.match This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw matching information.
